tool_description: Live-score API provides affordable and high-quality soccer api. We currently provide live-scores, fixtures, standings, match events, statistics, head2head, history data with lineups, pre-match odds, live odds, and country flags coming down the development pipe.
name: Live-Score-Api
title: Live-Score-Api

api_list.name: Match Events
api_list.description: Getting match event like: goals, yellow and red cards and people related to them

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the match which events we want to get

api_list.name: Countries List
api_list.description: Getting the list of the countries that we have in our database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/list.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/countries/list.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Competitions LIst
api_list.description: Getting the list of all supported competitions

optional_parameters.name: federation_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a federation in case we want only competition from certain federation like UEFA or CONMEBOL

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a country in case we want only competition from certain country like Germany

api_list.name: Livescores
api_list.description: Using the API endpoint you get livescores for all current matches

optional_parameters.name: competition_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the competition for which we want the results

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the country for which we want the live scores

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter code of a language in which we want the team names (ar, ru...)

api_list.name: Fixtures

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page with results, this endoint uses pagination

optional_parameters.name: competition_id
optional_parameters.description: The ID of a competition in case we want the fixtures for certain competition only

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Filters the fixtures by the date when the matches are scheduled to be played

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter ISO code of the language in which the response data should be in

optional_parameters.name: round
optional_parameters.description: The round which fixtures we want it could be a number or code like QF, SF, R16

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: The ID of a team in case we want all the fixtures for a certain team

api_list.name: Match Statistics
api_list.description: Getting match statistics like: possession, offsides, corners and more

optional_parameters.name: match_id
optional_parameters.description: The id of the match which events we are getting

api_list.name: History

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Date since when we want to get matches

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter ISO code of the language in which we want the data to be in

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: ID of a team in case we want only matches of a certain team

optional_parameters.name: competition_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a competition in case we want matches only from a certain competition

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number with matches as this endpoint uses pagination

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Date until when we want to get matches

api_list.name: Head2Head Team Comparison
api_list.description: Comparing 2 teams based on their recent performances

required_parameters.name: team2_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the second team that we are comparing

required_parameters.name: team1_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the team that we want to compare

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter iso code in which we want the data in

api_list.name: League Standings
api_list.description: Getting the classification table of a competition

required_parameters.name: season
required_parameters.description: The season for which we want it

required_parameters.name: competition_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the competition which standings we want

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: The id of a specific group in case, the competition has several groups like the Champions League

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter ISO code of the language in which we want the data in

api_list.name: Federations List
api_list.description: Getting the list of the federations AFC, CAF, CONMEBOL, UEFA and more
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-score-api.p.rapidapi.com/federations/list.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-score-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Teams list
api_list.description: Getting a list of the teams from our database

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Between 1 and 100, the number of teams per page

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The number of page, as this endpoint uses pagination

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a country in case we want teams from only one country

optional_parameters.name: federation_id
optional_parameters.description: ID of a country in case we want teams from only one federation, these will be national teams

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter ISO of the language in which we want the data in
